column4: anyone here have/use an IBM Atheros A/B/G Mini-PCI wireless card?
i have an atheros ABG
yes
consider urself lucky, when fc2 was released there was no way to get it to work till ndiswrapper 0.1
can you connect?
did you get it to work?
it works with madwifi

had to go out and fold a tent :p  | yeah, it works, but scanning does not work, so therefore i can only connect using the Gnome network applet, becuase all the other applets (like GTKwifi) require scanning to work
that is weird, usually if scan doesnt work you can't set essit
overall i think ubuntu is a better end user distro, fedora targets a broader group of people
so do i, but it's good to try every distro you can...
i used to, but i got "stuck" here
same :)
did you find out what command triggers the shutdown options screen?
what command would you use to shutdown without being a superuser?
that asks for root
i want to be able to shutdown from beep-media-player for instance
with the alarm plugin
cool tool for figuring out keysyms
